text: Kyun Hota Hai Pyarrr is an Indian television teen drama which originally aired on Star Plus, from 1 August 2002 to 22 July 2004. It starred Amit Sadh and Riva Bubber. The show used to air every Thursday at 8 P.M. from 1 August 2002 to 29 July 2004 ==Synopsis== The show revolves around Adi and Nikki and their group of friends in college. While Adi is a rich popular boy in college, Nikki moves to Mumbai and is an introvert trying to find her feet in a new city. Nikki meets several characters in college, making friends but falls out of favour with the rich and spoilt Ash who has had her sights set on Adi but Adi and Nikki fall in love with each other. == Cast == * Amit Sadh as Aditya (Adi) Bhargav * Riva Bubber as Nikita (Nikki) Sharma * Shilpa Tulaskar as Aarti Sharma * Sonal Pendse as Aishwarya (Ash) Kapoor * Vikas Sethi as Karan / Kukku * Shruti Seth as Ramya * Nazneen Patel / Shalini Pal as Malini * Harmeet Singh as Abhi * Shweta Gulati as Tara * Joe Warbis as Terry * Vinay Pathak as Professor * Pracheen Chauhan as Abhi * Kamya Panjabi as Ramya * Sudeep Sahir as Aditya (Adi) Bhargav ==References== == External links == *Kyun Hota Hai Pyarrr on STAR Plus Category:Indian television soap operas Category:Indian television series Category:Star Plus original programming Category:2002 Indian television series debuts Category:2004 Indian television series endings Category:Indian teen drama television series Category:Star Utsav original programming
title: Kyun Hota Hai Pyarrr
